General.Name: Xinjiang Baihuacun Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang Bai Hua Cun Pharma Tech Co.,Ltd engages in the pharmaceutical research and development, clinical trials, biomedicine, commercial properties, and other businesses. The company was formerly known as Xinjiang Baihuacun Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xinjiang Bai Hua Cun Pharma Tech Co.,Ltd in July 2021. Xinjiang Bai Hua Cun Pharma Tech Co.,Ltd was founded in 1959 and is based in Urumqi, China.
